attributes.action: To install CCTV in Stockton-on-Tees Cemetery’s
attributes.background: To make it law that all cemeteries should have CCTV to stop people damaging and taking things off peoples graves,

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
